definitions.definition: An igneous rock that is forced, while molten, into cracks or between other layers of rock
Tending to intrude; doing that which is not welcome; interrupting or disturbing; entering without permission or welcome.
definitions.example: Did it ever cross your mind that he might find all those questions you ask intrusive?

definitions.definition: Of rocks: forced, while in a plastic or molten state, into the cavities or between the cracks or layers of other rocks.
